overview: A spoken portrait about the old world of cinema. Situated in Morelia, MX, this is a journey through the eyes of the elderly locals and adults who grew up there, about the memories of those who lived at that time, where theaters were part of the urban landscape. Along with the memories of these people, we also travel to the present to meet the people who still have that 'cult' for the cinema.
title: Aún Nos Queda el Recuerdo
